statements: SELECT * FROM employee_work_hours WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT employee_id, work_date, hours_worked FROM employee_work_hours WHERE productivity_score > 80 ORDER BY work_date DESC
SELECT AVG(hours_worked) AS average_hours_worked, AVG(productivity_score) AS average_productivity FROM employee_work_hours
SELECT * FROM employee_work_hours ORDER BY productivity_score ASC, work_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM employee_work_hours WHERE hours_worked >= 8
SELECT * FROM employee_work_hours WHERE employee_id = 12345
SELECT employee_id, work_date, hours_worked FROM employee_work_hours WHERE productivity_score > 80 ORDER BY work_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, work_date, hours_worked, productivity_score FROM employee_work_hours WHERE hours_worked >= 8 AND productivity_score < 50 ORDER BY productivity_score ASC, work_date DESC
SELECT AVG(hours_worked), MIN(productivity_score), MAX(productivity_score) FROM employee_work_hours
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(DISTINCT work_date) AS days_worked FROM employee_work_hours GROUP BY employee_id HAVING days_worked > 5 ORDER BY days_worked DESC
SELECT * FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE productivity_score > 80;
SELECT employee_id, work_hours FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT MAX(work_hours) AS max_work_hours, MIN(work_hours) AS min_work_hours FROM EmployeeWorkHours;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(work_hours) AS total_work_hours FROM EmployeeWorkHours GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM PayrollAdministration ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(work_hours), SUM(work_hours) FROM EmployeeWorkHours GROUP BY employee_id HAVING SUM(work_hours) > 40;
SELECT employee_id, date, work_hours, productivity_score FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE productivity_score > 80 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM PayrollAdministration GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_payment > 5000 ORDER BY total_payment DESC;
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment, MIN(payment_amount) AS min_payment FROM PayrollAdministration WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeWorkHours;
SELECT employee_id, date, hours_worked FROM EmployeeWorkHours ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE hire_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT employee_id, base_salary, bonus, deductions, net_pay FROM EmployeePayroll WHERE base_salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, productivity_score, date FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE hours_worked > 8 ORDER BY productivity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE hours_worked > 8 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, base_salary, net_pay FROM EmployeePayroll WHERE bonus > 500 ORDER BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT AVG(productivity_score) AS avg_score, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT ep.employee_id, ep.email, ep.hire_date, ep.first_name, ep.lastjson me.last_name, ewh.hours_worked, ep.last_name FROM EmployeeProfile ep JOIN EmployeeWorkHours ewh ON ep.employee_id = ewh.employee_id WHERE ewh.hours_worked > 5;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, hourly_rate FROM employees WHERE is_remote = TRUE;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM timesheets WHERE hours_worked > 8;
SELECT * FROM productivity_metrics WHERE metric_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, hourly_rate FROM employees WHERE is_remote = true;
SELECT employee_name, hours_worked FROM employees INNER JOIN timesheets ON employees.employee_id = timesheets.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, payroll_id, total_pay FROM employees JOIN payroll ON employees.employee_id = payroll.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, metric_date, productivity_score FROM employees INNER JOIN productivity_metrics ON employees.employee_id = productivity_metrics.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Employee ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT metric_id, date, productivity_score FROM ProductivityMetrics WHERE productivity_score > 80;
SELECT department_name, total_employees FROM Department WHERE manager_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Payroll WHERE payment_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY hours_worked DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM WorkHours WHERE start_time < '09:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, productivity_score FROM ProductivityMetrics WHERE productivity_score > 80.0 ORDER BY productivity_score DESC;
SELECT SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM Payroll GROUP BY date;
SELECT department_name, manager_id, total_employees FROM Department ORDER BY total_employees DESC, department_name;
